thread.section_title: HomeAdvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HomeAdvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 10 of 403
thread.title: J.R. Meyer

author: J.R. Meyer
title: J.R. Meyer
text:
I would never have called the contractor I used, if they hadn't been recommended by Home. Hundreds of contractors to choose from, and E G Roofing is a relatively small company. However, the quality of service I received was first-rate!
In addition to recommending a contractor, Home Advisor staff called to follow-up, and ensured that I was being contacted by the contractor, and that they were actively working to meet my requirements / expectations.
I will definitely use Home Advisor for future projects, and recommend them to friends / family who are planning projects.
